title: N = 2 Supersymmetric Quantum Black Holes in Five Dimensional Heterotic String Vacua
abstract: Exact black hole solutions of the five dimensional heterotic $S$-$T$-$U$ model including all perturbative quantum corrections and preserving $1/2$ of $N=2$ supersymmetry are studied. It is shown that the quantum corrections yield a bound on electric charges and harmonic functions of the solutions.
